attributes.action: suspend the new proposed Co-operation  Agreement with Israel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: suspend the new proposed Co-operation  Agreement with Israel in view of their response to the United Nations resolution calling for an immediate  ceasefire in Gaza, Ehud Olmert stated on BBC World Service 10.9.09 that 'no-one should  decide for us' when   responding to questions about the UN's Resolution asking for a ceasefire  further reinforcing the criticism that Israel does not appear to adhere to International Laws and Humanitarian     Conventions. Indeed these have been broken several times in the present conflict in Gaza and in Israel's previous conflicts.
